titles.title: A bill to amend the Help America Vote Act of 2002 to require the availability of early voting or no-excuse absentee voting.
A bill to amend the Help America Vote Act of 2002 to require the availability of early voting or no-excuse absentee voting.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

bill.summary: This bill amends the Help America Vote Act of 2002 to require each state to: (1) allow individuals to vote in a federal election before the date of the election through early voting or voting by mail, and (2) publicize the details of such voting.
